reuters.title: CCC INTEREST RATE FOR APRIL IS SIX PCT -- USDA
reuters.body: The Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) interest rate on loans disbursed in April will carry a six pct ionterest rate, the U.S. Agriculture Department said. The April rate is up from March's 5-7/8 pct and reflects the interest rate charged CCC by the U.S. Treasury, the department said. Reuter 
